title: SQLSELECT DISTINCT Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLSELECT DISTINCT Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
SELECT DISTINCT
The
SELECT DISTINCT
command returns only 
distinct (different) values in the result set.
The following SQL statement selects only the DISTINCT values from the "Country" column in the "Customers" table:
Example
SELECT DISTINCT Country FROM Customers;

Reference

❯
★
+1
